item.title: Mocking HTTP response in Simple.OData client
item.description: 3rd party libraries never seems to be documented enough. It’s the old truth that every software developer learns sooner or later. In most cases after dozens of hours spent on trying to figure out “what the hell is wrong with my/that code!?”. This post is about one of such “hidden features” in Microsoft oData client - Simple.OData.
